r.d: This program reformat and beautify PHP 4 and PHP 5 source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP 5 and has a command line tool.
r.n: The one NOT before stable: ( The day of the AC! - Bug fix[7818]: Where curly brackets are used to indicate a variable class property, PHP_Beautifier adds extra whitespace as if it were parsing a class method or function. - Internal Bug 3: Removed log messages on command line. Use -v to get the verbose output (messages with PEAR_DEBUG_INFO level). ! Bug 7759 remains open, only when one or more case doesn't ends with a break.
